TopicTitle: [Patch 2] Precision controls mode causes loss of crew and vehicle

Articles.Content: This mode is really bad and has no place as far as I can tell.  Maybe it is for docking but there is already a docking mode?  Docking mode is itself pretty unclear when it is turned on, but precision controls are totally unclear.  If you hit capslock during a crucial landing you are done.  I have only found what this is after investigating a loss of control situation.  Fortunately this is with a small vehicle that still had control.  The only thing the user sees is lack of control and assumes it is a bug.  Which it is is a bug the way it has been implemented.

Where precision control is the most obvious for me is when using RCS.

RCS gets used at a lesser degree for finer control.

And it is buggy right now which gives inconsistent results.
